Name: Juicy Army
About the game: Juicy army is the sweetest action roguelike set in a dream universe where you'll have to fight an army of juicy creatures! Key Features: Discover a world full of delicious treats! This fantasy kingdom is made of sweet and delightful objects! Explore Strawberry Island, Cheese Forest, Candy Land, Cookie City, Chocolate Realm, and so on. Exotic fruity enemies! There are flying berries, bouncing orange, sniper apple, watermelon bandit, and a lot of other juicy creatures. But don't let their cute appearance fool you! They may look cute, but they can get vicious quickly! As you progress, you'll find loads of interesting weapons. Responsive, fluid, and fun to play combat system! Throughout your journey, you'll unlock new items, each with different strengths. Harness the power of these new abilities and smash through all obstacles! Beat down powerful bosses. Procedurally generated worlds blended with handcrafted design elements to keep each run fresh and unique. Beautiful and adorable art style!
